pt.ua.gboard.basic

Class PolygonComposedGelem

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.gboard.Gelem
      • pt.ua.gboard.basic.PolygonComposedGelem

  • public class PolygonComposedGelem
extends Gelem
    This gelem allows the (immutable) construction of a set of polygons. Each polygon is filled with a specified color. The coordinate system for polygon definition is the square with vertexes: {0,0} (top-left); {1,0} (top-right); {0,1} (bottom-left); {1,1} (bottom-right)
